author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA IS STRENGTHENING... ...OUTER BANDS COULD BRING HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS TO PORTIONS OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR LATER TODAY AND WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...PRISCILLA IS STRENGTHENING... ...OUTER BANDS COULD BRING HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS TO PORTIONS OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR LATER TODAY AND WEDNESDAY... As of 2:00 AM MST Tue Oct 07 the center of Priscilla was located near 19.4, -109.5 with movement NW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 967 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
